testcase.name: Verifying GET request to retrieve single program data with valid program ID
testcase.system-out: Given User sets request for Program module with valid base URL and valid path.passed When User sends GET request with valid program ID from "getsingleprogram" and 0.passed Then Request should be successfull with status code "200" for GET single program.passed
